data.eml:eml: Synopsis of the genus Pseudosparna Mermudes & Monné (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Lamiinae), with description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Monné, Miguel A., Monné, Marcela L. (2014): Synopsis of the genus Pseudosparna Mermudes & Monné (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Lamiinae), with description of two new species. Zootaxa 3852 (5): 595-598, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3852.5.9
